# Federico Carrone

> Personal website of Federico Carrone, entrepreneur working at the intersection of technology, finance, and culture. Founder of Ergodic Group and LambdaClass.

Federico Carrone writes about distributed systems, cryptography, type systems, formal verification, philosophy, and the convergence of digital infrastructure, capital markets, and cultural production.

## Articles

- [Type Systems: From Untyped Lambda Calculus to Dependent Types](https://federicocarrone.com/articles/type-systems/): Comprehensive exploration of type systems from untyped lambda calculus through dependent types, covering Hindley-Milner, linear types, and formal verification
- [The Death of the Inner Self](https://federicocarrone.com/articles/the-death-of-the-inner-self/): Philosophy essay on interiority, consciousness, and the modern erosion of inner life
- [Notes on Culture, Infrastructure, Time and Ergodicity](https://federicocarrone.com/articles/notes-on-culture-infrastructure-time-and-ergodicity/): Reflections on how time, path dependence, and ergodicity shape technology and culture
- [Crypto Doctrine](https://federicocarrone.com/articles/crypto-doctrine/): Strategic framework for thinking about cryptocurrency and blockchain technology
- [Transforming the Future with Zero Knowledge Proofs, Fully Homomorphic Encryption and New Distributed Systems Algorithms](https://federicocarrone.com/articles/transforming-the-future-with-zero-knowledge-proofs-fully-homomorphic-encryption-and-new-distributed-systems-algorithms/): Overview of cryptographic primitives reshaping computing

## Series

- [Ethereum Series](https://federicocarrone.com/series/ethereum/): Deep dive into Ethereum as infrastructure and financial system
- [Concrete Programming Language](https://federicocarrone.com/series/concrete/): Systems programming language designed for formal reasoning

## About

- [About Federico Carrone](https://federicocarrone.com/about/): Background, philosophy, and approach to building technology companies

## Optional
